title: Providing Clear Next Steps
text: Think about what actions you want the audience to take after the presentation, and include them at the end of the presentation to guide the audience.

title: Making Presentations Effective
text: Your data tells a story and the story should provide push the audience to take action. Providing steps can help with this step.

title: Feasibility
text: It might not be feasible to tailor an action plan to each participant in the audience, given time and resource constraints.
